title: Overflowing Dustbin in Mohakhali
description: Dustbins have not been emptied for 5 days, causing foul smell and scattered garbage.

title: Plastic Waste Dumping in Park
description: People dumping plastic bottles and bags in public park causing environmental hazard.

title: Uncollected Organic Waste
description: Organic waste left on street corners attracting stray animals and pests.

title: Unauthorized Shop on Footpath
description: A shop was built illegally on public footpath, blocking pedestrian access.

title: Encroached Roadside Structure
description: Illegal construction encroaching on main road, causing traffic jam.

title: Fence Built in Public Park
description: Unauthorized fence built inside a public park restricting public access.

title: Broken Street Light
description: Street light not working for a week, creating dark and unsafe streets at night.

title: Damaged Public Bench
description: Bench in the park is broken, posing a risk for people sitting.
